title: IT Learner
description: This learnership is a 12-month intensive development Programme. It allows individuals to gain valuable working experience and theoretical training. The Tolcon Learnership Programme will provide you with a solid foundation for a successful career in the IT field.
responsibilities: Learn to organize and schedule upgrades and maintenance without deterring others from completing their work
Learn security and privacy compliance of networks and computer systems
Learn to install and configure appropriate hardware, software, and functions according to specifications and company standards
Learn to set-up, configure and maintain computer, user and e-mail accounts on all systems
Provide orientation and guidance to users on how to operate software and computer equipment
Learn to Manage and revise the layout of SharePoint, as well as the customization on SharePoint site for company purposes
Learn the monitoring, troubleshooting and provide technical support for SharePoint users
Learn to maintain records of SharePoint updates, maintenance, and activity
Ensuring distribution of operating system, company standard applications, and antivirus updates
Maintain and monitor communication infrastructure to remote sites
General end user hardware and software support that includes troubleshooting and successful resolution of incidents and problems
Understand service desk ticketing, successful resolution of assigned incidents and problem tickets, and meeting SLAs
qualifications: Any further formal IT related studies will be advantages or studying towards IT qualification
Applicants must be South African citizens with a valid South African ID number
Applicants must be under the age of 35
Preference will be given to disabled applicants
Good writing, documenting and communication Skills in English
Good problem solving and trouble shooting skills
